name: Hod
title: Hod - Norse Mythology
subtitle: The Blind God
shortDescription: The blind god who unwittingly killed his brother Baldr when Loki placed a mistletoe dart in his hand. Son of Odin and Frigg , Hod represents the tragic figure manipulated by malice, an innocent instrument of cosmic catastrophe.
longDescription: Hod was blind from birth and stood apart from the games when the gods threw weapons at the invulnerable Baldr . Loki approached him and offered to guide his hand, giving him a dart made of mistletoe. When Hod threw it, Baldr fell dead. In revenge, Vali, another son of Odin , killed Hod while he was only one day old. After Ragnarok , both Hod and Baldr will return from Hel to inhabit the renewed world.
